title: Epic 19: Chiropractic Clinical Intelligence
description: Deep chiropractic-specific clinical features including subluxation tracking, vertebral listings, technique library, adjustment documentation, and spinal analysis tools. The core differentiator that makes ChiroFlow built specifically for chiropractors.

userStories.title: Chiropractic clinical schema
userStories.description: Create database models for chiropractic-specific clinical data.
acceptanceCriteria: Subluxation model with patientId, encounterId, vertebra, listing, severity, notes
SubluxationHistory model for tracking changes over time
Technique model with name, category, description, contraindications
Adjustment model with encounterId, vertebra, technique, force, direction, response
VertebralListing model with segment, laterality, rotation, flexion, extension
SpinalRegion enum (Cervical, Thoracic, Lumbar, Sacral, Pelvis)
ChiropracticExam model with leg length, muscle testing, palpation findings

userStories.title: Technique library management
userStories.description: Create comprehensive library of chiropractic adjustment techniques.
acceptanceCriteria: technique.list - List all techniques with filtering by category
technique.get - Get technique details with contraindications
Seed standard techniques: Diversified, Gonstead, Thompson, Activator, SOT, Cox Flexion, Toggle Recoil
Category grouping: Manual, Instrument-assisted, Table-assisted, Low-force
Include indications and contraindications for each technique

userStories.title: Subluxation documentation
userStories.description: Document and track vertebral subluxations with detailed listings.
acceptanceCriteria: subluxation.list - List patient subluxations by region
Support standard listing notations (PLS, PRI, AS, PI, etc.)

userStories.title: Adjustment documentation
acceptanceCriteria: adjustment.create - Record adjustment with technique, segment, response
Record pre/post findings (leg length, ROM, pain)
Document patient response (cavitation, muscle guarding, relief)
Track adjustment count by segment over time
Quick entry templates for common adjustment patterns

userStories.title: Vertebral listing system
userStories.description: Comprehensive vertebral listing and misalignment documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: Support Gonstead listing notation (PLS, PRI, PRS, PLI, AS, PI, IN, EX)
Visual spine diagram with listing indicators
Auto-suggest related segments based on biomechanics

userStories.title: Spinal analysis tools
userStories.description: Interactive spinal analysis and documentation tools.
acceptanceCriteria: Export spine diagram to SOAP note

userStories.title: Chiropractic clinical dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Patient spine overview with current subluxations
